This will allow you to perform actions whenever database-events are happening (=eventlistener)

<img src="data:image/png;base64,">

| Trigger Type | subtype                 | pre | post | How to trigger |
|-|-|-|-|-|
| Database     | Object is requested     | ✓ |  |any `.get()` or `.find()` Parse query-calls on server or client |
| Database     | Object is returned      |  | ✓ |any `.get()` or `.find()` Parse query-calls on server or client |
| Database     | Object is being created | ✓ |  | any `.save()` or `.signUp()` Parse-calls on server or client |
| Database     | Object is created | | ✓ | any `.save()` or `.signUp()` Parse-calls on server or client |
| Database     | Object was created | | ✓ | any `.save()` or `.signUp()` Parse-calls on server or client |
| Database     | Object is being deleted | ✓ |  | any `.destroy()` Parse-calls on server or client |
| Database     | Object was deleted | | ✓ | any `.destroy()` Parse-calls on server or client |
